job.title: Data Scientist, International Payments
job.description: stronguCompany DescriptionbrbrustrongSquare builds common business tools in unconventional ways so more people can start run and grow their businesses When Square started it was difficult and expensive or just plain impossible for some businesses to take credit cards Square made credit card payments possible for all by turning a mobile phone into a credit card reader Since then Square has been building an entire business toolkit of both hardware and software products including Square Capital Square Terminal Square Payroll and more Were working to find new and better ways to help businesses succeed on their own termsand were looking for people like you to help shape tomorrow at SquarebrbrstronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongThe Payments Product team manages Squareaposs flagship product We are stewards of Squareaposs largest product making it possible for any seller to easily take a credit card payments Our product drives awareness of the Square brand is Squareaposs first touchpoint with most of our sellers and fuels the economics of the broader Square ecosystem Our sellers have evolving needs and expectations and it is our job to understand who they are and how we can best help thembrbrPayments Productaposs International Team will launch and grow our payments business in all international markets We are focused on customizing and localizing our payments offering to tailor the needs and customs of each market You will work with both our product and gotomarket GTM teams to help them make databased decisions while reporting into a Senior Manager on the Data Science team You and your team will prioritize and set product and GTM road maps Sound like you Read onbrbrstronguYou WillbrustrongulliPartner with Squareaposs product engineering design marketing and finance teams to make decisions using a diverse set of tactics including statistics quantitative reasoning and machine learningliliIndependently research questions related to our most important product experiences and produce recommendations for peers and leadershipliliDesign run and analyze experiments with the goal of optimizing acquisition activation and retention measurementsliliCommunicate analysis and decisions to peers and leadership in verbal visual and written medialiliBuild selfservice data tools that allow us to monitor the health and performance of our primary businessliliDemonstrate data best practices and be an advocate for a datadriven culture across SquarebrliulstronguYou HavebrbrustrongstrongQualificationsbrstrongulliA degree in Mathematics Statistics Computer Science Economics or a related quantitative fieldlili3 years industry experience in data science roles with either a growth or product focusliliExperience designing and analyzing AB experimentsliliFamiliarity with ETL development and best practicesliliExperience communicating analysis and decisions to peers and leadership in verbal visual and written medialiliExperience working embedded within a growth or product teamliliBonus Experience applying both databacked heuristics and machinelearning techniques to solve personalization and recommendation problemsliliBonus Experience in the payments or FinTech spacebrliulstronguTechnologies We Use And TeachbrustrongulliSQL Snowflake BigQuery Airflow and LookerliliGoogle Cloud Platform and AWSliliPython and RliliMachine learning and statistical modeling frameworksbrliulstronguAdditional InformationbrbrustrongWere working to build a more inclusive economy where our customers have equal access to opportunity and we strive to live by these same values in building our workplace Square is a proud equal opportunity employer We work hard to evaluate all employees and job applicants consistently without regard to race color religion gender national origin age disability veteran status pregnancy gender expression or identity sexual orientation citizenship or any other legally protected classbrbrWe believe in being fair and are committed to an inclusive interview experience including providing reasonable accommodations to disabled applicants throughout the recruitment process We encourage applicants to share any needed accommodations with their recruiter who will treat these requests as confidentially as possiblebrbrAdditionally we consider qualified applicants with criminal histories for employment on our team assessing candidates in a manner consistent with the requirements of the San Francisco Fair Chance OrdinancebrbrstrongPerksbrbrstrongAt Square we want you to be well and thrive Our global benefits package includesbrulliHealthcare coverageliliRetirement PlansliliEmployee Stock Purchase ProgramliliWellness perksliliPaid parental leaveliliPaid time offliliLearning and Development resourcesbrliulemSquare Inc NYSE SQ builds tools to empower businesses and individuals to participate in the economy Sellers use Square to reach buyers online and in person manage their business and access financing Individuals use Cash App to spend send store and invest money And TIDAL is a global music and entertainment platform that expands Squareaposs purpose of economic empowerment to
